name: JAI SA-MA-RU
description:
In a village, a meteorite fell in front of the village. The chunk of the meteorite began to release certain chemicals, causing the vegetable fields in the village to be exposed to chemicals, leading to the brooding and madness. The villagers, sensing the vibrations and sounds coming from the front of the village, walked out to explore with a sword. Villagers encountered a mutated vegetable field. Even if he has destroyed much, it will not be finished. The only way to stop this spread is to find a village chief who knows chemicals. Hurry to find him before he can't stop.     

Control

 W A S D - Move

 SPACEBAR - Jump

 LEFT CLICK MOUSE - Attack
